籤詩版本二:
Isicwangciso, incwadi, kunye nencwadi. Sukulinge wenze emva kokucinga ngaphambi kokuba ucinge.
Xa ixesha lifikile, abantu abahloniphekileyo baya kukunceda, kwaye uya kuhlala ngoxolo njengethayile.
詩意:
Le ndlu yehexagram ifana nodonga.
Yonke into ikhuselekile kwaye ayinangozi.
解曰: Yenza into entsha ngento endala. Iintyatyambo ezibandayo zidibana entwasahlobo. Ivinjiwe ngaphambili. Ngoku ndonelisekile.
籤詩故事一:
◇ULiu Ji wabongoza uYehova
KuMing Dynasty, uLiu Ji, ogama lakhe lembeko yayinguBowen kunye nesihloko emva kokufa kukaWencheng, wazalelwa eQingtian (ngoku eyiWencheng County), eZhejiang.
Ufundeka kakuhle kwiiklasikhi kunye nembali, kwaye ulungile ekubhaleni imibongo kunye namanqaku. Wayenobuchule kwi-astronomy kunye nobugcisa bezomkhosi kwaye wanceda uZhu Yuanzhang ukuba amanyanise ihlabathi.
Ngelo xesha, uZhu Yuanzhang wakhetha waza wakhokela amajoni akhe e-Anfeng, enethemba lokukhulula iSixeko sase-Anfeng.
U-Liu Ji weza kumnqanda ngokukhawuleza, egweba ukuba uya koyiswa ukuba uya khona. Njengoko uLiu Ji wayelindele, uZhu Yuanzhang wayevaleleke.
Iinjengele uXu Da kunye noChang Yuchun beza kumhlangula, kwaye uZhu Yuanzhang wakwazi ukusaba.
聖意: Ithamsanqa kwikhaya kunye nendlu, isiqu sakho, ubutyebi, ubunzima beshishini, umtshato, kubafazi abahambahambayo eLiujia, nge-silkworms kade, ngemfuyo emithandathu, ukufumana abantu, ukutshutshiswa kade, ukufuduka, ukulahleka kwempahla. kwaye akukho mkhondo, ngenxa yokugula, ukugcina amangcwaba kwiNtaba yeYan'an, kunye nenhlanhla.
